fb579e5b-c5c7-4dee-9c41-b9a5128313a1.description: This badge is a symbol of discovering individual greatness within; whilst completing an in-house leadership development programme customised for Spinneys - Emerging Leaders. Individual greatness in crossing the chasm between leading self through reflection, empowerment and accountability; and leading teams through relationship building; and in the final instance preparing to evolve from a value creator in the organisation, to becoming an inspirational game changer.
fb579e5b-c5c7-4dee-9c41-b9a5128313a1.name: Spinneys Future Leaders Excellence Programme (FLEX) - Emerging Leader

issuer.summary: issued by Platform For Connected Leadership

badge_template_activities.title: The 5 Lens Evaluation looks at the 5 essential levels of interaction that a leader has with their team. These levels are further divided into more detailed sections that create a holistic overview of the leader and their unique levels of success and development areas. The 5 Lens Evaluation looks at:  Personal Mastery, Emotional Resilience, Social Drives, Energy Centers: The Enneagram Model: The Nine Ways of the Enneagram
Module 1: Leading Self  - Assessing your Leadership Style; Aligning your Leadership Style; Self-Reflection Exercises EQ Assessment
Module 2: Cultural Competence - Multi-cultural Awareness and Knowledge
Module 3: Effective Communication - Business, Email and Customer Communication, Presentation Skills
Module 4: Learning to Excel - Mindfulness, Curiosity, Intuition, Connectedness
Module 5: Levels of Influence - Leading Upward, Downward and Sideways
Module 6 : Building Team Cohesion - Understand Team Cohesion, Value Everyone’s Contribution, Resolve Conflicts within the Group
Module 7: Team Motivation - Empower Team Members, Motivating Team Performance
Module 8: Customer Centric Organisation - Understanding True Customer Service, Managing Customer Expectations in Store, Building Customer Relationships

Project DISRUPT © is a unique process that combines a series of practical application exercises, each phase designed to measure participants knowledge, understanding and ability to think creatively through the means of a practical and operational implementable project. The delivery requires an interactive presentation with various stakeholders, designed to get participants to think on their feet and showcase their learning throughout this journey.

dcdfd2cc-3e17-4bc1-a16d-73a2d0870982.description: This badge is a symbol of discovering individual greatness within; whilst completing an in-house leadership development programme customised for Spinneys - Champion Leaders. Individual greatness in crossing the chasm between leading self through reflection; and leading teams through relationship building; and in the final instance leading the organisation not just during disruption, but also to become a disruptor, a game changer and an inspiration to competitors and other businesses alike.
dcdfd2cc-3e17-4bc1-a16d-73a2d0870982.name: Spinneys Future Leaders Excellence Programme (FLEX) - Champion Leader

badge_template_activities.title: The 5 Lens Evaluation looks at the 5 essential levels of interaction that a leader has with their team. These levels are further divided into more detailed sections that create a holistic overview of the leader and their unique levels of success and development areas. The 5 Lens Evaluation looks at:  Personal Mastery, Emotional Resilience, Social Drives, Energy Centers: The Enneagram Model: The Nine Ways of the Enneagram
Module 1: Leading Self - Leadership Style Identification, Aligning your Leadership Style, Self-Reflection EQ Assessment
Module 2: Leading High Performing Teams - The Optimal Leadership Equilibrium, Develop Team Cohesion, Creating a High Performance Team through an Integral Approach
Module 2: Strategic Leadership in a Complex World - Leading in a VUCA World, 4th Industrial Revolution & Complexity, Complex Decision Making
Module 4: Big Picture Thinking - Understanding the Contextual and Environmental Business Environment, Strategic Positioning for Competitive Advantage

Module 5: Building a Customer Centric Organisation - Focus on the Customer through a Winning Aspiration, Understanding Competitiveness through Dominant Attribute Differentiation, Multi-cultural Awareness and Knowledge
Module 6: Creating a Culture of Innovation - Innovative Thinking Skills, Harnessing Innovative Ideas, Innovate Through Technology
Module 7: Understanding Disruption - Initiate and Implement Change for Improved Performance
Module 8: Align Implementation through Business Model Design - Understand Business Model Flexibility & Competitive Advantage, Measuring Internal Business Process & External Customer Satisfaction
Module 9: Understand the Complete Retail Transactional Pipeline - Apply Resources, Approach to the Organisation as a System, Understand the Importance of Customer Demand

Project DISRUPT © is a unique process that combines a series of practical application exercises, each phase designed to measure participants knowledge, understanding and ability to think creatively through the means of a practical and operational implementable project. The delivery requires an interactive presentation with various stakeholders, designed to get participants to think on their feet and showcase their learning throughout this journey.

85746589-621f-4a5b-a306-cc65472e26ea.description: This badge is a symbol of excelling beyond the skills competencies of a conventional MBA, completing all nine future orientated modules of the most critical competencies needed to navigate through the challenges of the 21st century world of work. Completing this course means crossing the chasm between existing learning and experience and what is needed to redefine management and leadership for the future.
